CustomComponents.Name: Greed
CustomComponents.Description: Deals bonus damage for each valuables token this character holds.

Actions.Name: Scrap Turret
Actions.Description: The Tinker summons a turret in range 6.

Summons.Name: Scrap Turret
Summons.SummonEffects: When a foe in range 3 from the turret takes damage, the turret deals 1 piercing damage to them. The Junker can only have one of these turrets active at once, and using this ability again while one is out resummons it to a new space.

Actions.Name: Pile It Up
Actions.Description: The Junker creates a height 1 or 2 scrap pile object in a space in range 6. Characters adjacent to it when it is created are shoved 1. If created under a character, it pushes them up on top of it instead.

Actions.Name: Disassemble
Actions.Description: The Junker destroys all objects and Scrap Turrets in range 2, turning them into valuables tokens. Objects that can't normally be destroyed are instead un-summoned and removed from the battlefield.

Actions.Name: Scrap Blast
Actions.Description: A foe in range 8 is shattered and shoved 1.

CustomComponents.Name: Greed
CustomComponents.Description: Can only be used if holding a valuables token.
